page.title: 09Housing in West Wickham
page.content: Most of the houses in the area are semi-detached but there are some flats, terraced and detached houses as well. At the end of Mounthurst Rd. there are old people's flats. There's an old house down by Pickhurst Pond. The house is about two hundred years old. Most of the house is timber and bricks.ost of the buildings around Pickhurst are post war but some are pre-war. Pickhurst Tavern overlooks Pickhurst Green. There is a bungalow built in the 1940's. In Sedgewood Close are two detached houses and about eight semi-detached houses. They are quite small and could fit four or five people in them. They were built about 1979. Madeleine Elsdon, Pickhurst.
